sections.title: Our Money-Back Guarantee
sections.description: Most coaches do not offer a money-back guarantee, but we do. Why?

sections.title: We Believe in Our Service
sections.description: We are confident in our coaching. We know how to help you reach your fitness goals.

sections.title: Action is Required
sections.description: The best plan will not work if you do not take action.

sections.title: Money-Back Guarantee Rules
points: You must have at least 80% attendance (Tracked in Progress Tracker).
You must share exercise videos and meal updates (On Telegram Chat).
This guarantee applies only to the TRANSFORM PRO Plan.

sections.title: Are You Ready?
sections.description: If you are ready to take action, commit today. We will take care of the rest.
